message.content:
cs.CR, cs.DC, cs.NI, cs.SY, cs.PF 

Reasoning: 
1. cs.CR (Cryptography and Security) - The paper discusses the queueing study of blockchain systems, which involves security and cryptography aspects. 
2. cs.DC (Distributed, Parallel, and Cluster Computing) - The paper deals with the analysis of blockchain systems, which are distributed systems. 
3. cs.NI (Networking and Internet Architecture) - The paper discusses the performance measures of blockchain systems, which are related to networking and internet architecture. 
4. cs.SY (Systems and Control) - The paper develops a framework for analyzing the performance of blockchain systems, which can be considered as a control problem. 
5. cs.PF (Performance) - The paper focuses on the performance analysis of blockchain systems, which is the main topic of this sub-category.
